original_text: People told John's disciples about what had happened. So they went to the prison. They took away John's body and they buried it.
korean_text: 요한의 제자들이 듣고 와서 시체를 가져다가 장사하니라

sentences.original_text: People told John's disciples about what had happened.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 요한의 제자들에게 일어난 일을 알려주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: So they went to the prison.
